text:
Hey, @poll.blue
Which Amendment of the US CON is most tsundere?

A- 1A “I’ll write bad things about you if you don’t vote for me”
B- 2A “I’ll shoot if you don’t vote for me.”
C- 3A “It’s not like I want you in my house anyways”
D- 4A “You think you can hide things from me?”
question: Which Amendment of the US CON is most tsundere?
answers: 1A “I’ll write bad things about you if you don’t vote for me”
2A “I’ll shoot if you don’t vote for me.”
3A “It’s not like I want you in my house anyways”
4A “You think you can hide things from me?”
